mapper.select: select id,siteName,siteDesc,siteUrl,sort from partner where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into partner(siteName, siteUrl, siteDesc, sort) VALUES (#{siteName},#{siteUrl},#{siteDesc},#{sort})
mapper.update: update partner set siteName = #{siteName},siteUrl = #{siteUrl},siteDesc = #{siteDesc},sort = #{sort} where id =#{id}
